@UofT_dlsph's @cjrutty is cited here on the need for a publicly owned, end-to-end vaccine producer, much like we once had in Connaught Laboratories, which originated at U of T and played a major role eradicating polio, smallpox diphtheria. https://t.co/Lxid0LdWnw

My mom was a nurse and VP of a hospital in her 20s. She resigned on a matter of principle for the protection of her team. On #IWD2021 I'm thinking of you, Unnur Anna Kristjansson Brown, and the bravery of all the women who take a stand to make things better. https://t.co/e1LmwXewCC
